attributes.action: do more to protect whales and dolphins around the British coastline.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent report by the Whale and Dolphin Conservation Society gave the British Government a score of 1 out of 10 for its efforts to protect whales and dolphins around the British coastline. There are particular problems with regard to noise pollution and drift nets. These beautiful creatures need protecting and I urge the minister responsible to put in place measures immediately that will ease the pressures on their habitats.
